db.string: No entry was found for the given ID.

sendmail.string: There was an error while sending e-mail message. Maybe your mailserver is out of order?

upload.string: POST-Data not correct or missing! Required: projectTitle and file-data upload.
Client did not send fileChecksum! Are you using an outdated Catroid version?
The checksum of the uploaded file differs from the checksum generated by the client!
The size of the project file exceed the max filesize limit!
Uploading projects with project title 'defaultProject' is not allowed.
There are insulting words in the project title!
There are insulting words in the project description!
One of the SQL queries in the BadWordsFilter class failed!

download.string: Could not find requested file on server

flag.string: POST-Data not correct or missing! Required: projectId and flagReason.

viewer.string: Could not find html viewer file.
Could not find necessary module for ajax request

auth.string: The password or nickname was incorrect.
The response of the mediawiki API was incorrect.
Authentication of device failed: invalid auth-token!
